mapper.select: SELECT su.id, su.user_name, su.open_id, GROUP_CONCAT(sr.modules SEPARATOR '') AS modules, GROUP_CONCAT(sr.role) AS roles FROM sys_user AS su, sys_user_role AS rur, sys_role AS sr WHERE su.id = #{id} AND su.id = rur.user_id AND sr.id = rur.role_id
SELECT id, user_name, user_password, open_id FROM sys_user WHERE user_name = #{userName}
SELECT id, user_name, user_password, open_id, phone_number, user_code FROM sys_user WHERE open_id = #{openId}
